product_name: NRS Imperial 4 Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board - 10' 6"
long_description: The Imperial 4 Inflatable Paddle Board disproves the theory that no single board can do several things well. This versatile board performs great for fitness paddling, touring and light river running.
short_description: The Imperial 4 Inflatable Paddle Board disproves the theory that no single board can do several things well. This versatile board performs great for fitness paddling, touring and light river running.
